.. _create-an-account:

Create an account
=================

1. Navigate to the Terminus GPS Notifications `register`_ page.

2. Complete the "Are you a human?" challenge.

3. Enter your personal information into the registration form.

4. Click the *Register* button at the bottom of the form.

5. `Login`_ using the credentials you used in step 3.

.. _register: https://api.terminusgps.com/register/
.. _login: https://api.terminusgps.com/login/
